translation.en: [narrator] Meet Terry Seattle, Homicide Division.
translation.it: Lui è Terry Seattle, sezione omicidi.

translation.en: For Terry, every day, means a new murder case,
translation.it: Per Terry, un nuovo giorno significa un nuovo caso di omicidio,

translation.en: and a new celebrity guest star as his partner.
translation.it: e un nuovo ospite famoso come partner.

translation.en: Today's guest: comedy legend Conan O'Brien.
translation.it: L'ospite di oggi è la leggenda della comicità Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: But here's the catch.
translation.it: Ma c'è un colpo di scena.

translation.en: Conan isn't being given a script.
translation.it: A Conan non è stato dato un copione.

translation.en: He has no idea what's about to happen.
translation.it: Non ha idea di cosa succederà.

translation.en: Together, he and Terry will have to improvise their way through the case.
translation.it: Lui e Terry dovranno improvvisare per tutta la durata delle indagini.

translation.en: But it'll be up to Conan alone to name the killer.
translation.it: Ma sarà solo Conan a decidere chi è l'assassino.

translation.en: So join them as they punch a one-way ticket
translation.it: Unitevi a loro in questo viaggio di sola andata…

translation.en: to Murderville.
[male deep voice] The big city.
Where only the strong survive…
translation.it: Dove solo i più forti sopravvivono,

translation.en: And the ruthless… thrive.
I just made that rhyme up.
No big deal. I can do all sorts of cool stuff.
translation.it: Non è niente di che. So fare un sacco di cose forti.

translation.en: My name is Terry Seattle.
I'm a senior homicide detective. And I am killing it.
translation.it: Sono il detective capo della sezione omicidi. E sono il migliore.

translation.en: Morning, Chief.
Pleasure to see you.
Pleasure to see you. I hope you're doing very well.
translation.it: Il piacere è mio. Spero tu stia bene.

translation.en: I am doing very well. Thank you.
You need to come past the house and pick up the rest of your crap.
translation.it: Devi venire a casa a prenderti la tua spazzatura.

translation.en: That is not crap, Rhonda, that's 17 years of marriage.
translation.it: Non è spazzatura, Rhonda, sono 17 anni di matrimonio.

translation.en: It's a broken PlayStation 2, some old Maxim magazines,
translation.it: È una PlayStation 2 rotta, qualche vecchio numero di Maxim,

translation.en: a car wash receipt signed by Axl Rose
translation.it: la ricevuta di un lavaggio auto autografata da Axl Rose,

translation.en: and a "Take me drunk I'm home" t-shirt.
translation.it: e la maglietta di "Take me drunk, I'm home".

translation.en: If you had read just one of those Maxim articles,
translation.it: Se avessi letto un solo articolo di quei Maxim,

translation.en: you would know that as a modern male--
Terry, come get your shit or I'm throwing it out.
translation.it: Vieni a prenderti quella roba, o la butto.

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Don't pout, Detective. I've got a present for you.
translation.it: Non tenermi il broncio, Detective. Ho un regalo per te.

translation.en: A new partner.
No, you can't be serious. Come on, my life's not going wrong enough as it is
translation.it: Non dirai sul serio! La mia vita va già abbastanza male così,

translation.en: that I gotta babysit some homicide trainee?
translation.it: devo anche fare da babysitter a uno stagista?

translation.en: Do you not remember what happened when I babysat your nephew?
translation.it: Ricordi quando ho fatto da babysitter a tuo nipote?

translation.en: Come on out, Conan.
[Rhonda] Come a little closer.
I never liked to presume how close I can get.
translation.it: Non so mai quanto posso avvicinarmi.

translation.en: [Rhonda] That's just fine.
Terry, meet your new partner, Conan O'Brien.
translation.it: Terry, ti presento il tuo nuovo partner, Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: Conan, this is senior detective, Terry Seattle.
translation.it: Conan, lui è il detective capo Terry Seattle.

translation.en: Good to see you, sir. How are you?
Got quite a grip on you, huh?
-[Conan] Yeah. -Good Lord.
-[Terry] Yes. [chuckles] -[Conan] Yeah, okay. Yeah.
Put your fingers in your ears.
Are you joking?
I mean, did I just turn seven years old? Because you hired a goddamn clown!
translation.it: Ho appena compiuto sette anni? Perché hai assunto un maledetto clown!

translation.en: You're the only detective who can't keep a partner.
translation.it: Sei l'unico detective che non sa tenersi un partner.

translation.en: Yeah, because they're all idiots!
I mean, look at this guy with his fingers in his ears. I mean, God!
translation.it: Guarda questo con le dita nelle orecchie. Santo Cielo!

translation.en: I can actually,
the fingers don't actually block out the sound that well,
translation.it: Le dita non bloccano proprio tutti i suoni,

translation.en: so I heard clown, I heard idiot.
translation.it: quindi ho sentito sia clown sia idiota.

translation.en: Terry, make it work.
translation.it: Terry, fa' in modo che funzioni.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Let me tell you something.
This ginger monstrosity is the biggest mistake in the history of city homicide!
translation.it: Questo pel di carota è il più grande errore nella storia della sezione omicidi!

translation.en: No offense.
None taken.
You seem very nervous.
It's my first day on the job and you're a bit of a legend, so.
translation.it: È il mio primo giorno qui, e lei è quasi una leggenda.

translation.en: It's Terry Seattle. Is that it?
You do more bowing than a goddamn Tommy Tune.
translation.it: Fai più riverenze di un dannato Tommy Tune.

translation.en: Okay, bit of an outdated reference if you ask me, but--
translation.it: Ok, è una citazione un po' datata, ma…

translation.en: Follow me.
-It's a great office you have here. -[chuckles]
Talker.
Yeah. Okay.
Senior detective, Terry Seattle. And no, I've never been.
translation.it: Detective capo Terry Seattle. E, no, non ci sono mai stato.

translation.en: That was gonna be my first question.
-Of course it was. -Yeah.
I got married in Seattle.
What?
I got married in Seattle.
No, I mean, you got married?
Yeah.
To what?
To a wonderful woman.
Does she know?
She has an idea. Let's just put it that way.
Listen,
I hope you don't take this personal,
but I'm not really looking for a new partner. I already had the best.
translation.it: ma non sto cercando un nuovo partner. Quello che avevo era perfetto.

translation.en: Her name was Lori Griffin. And she was murdered 15 years ago.
translation.it: Si chiamava Lori Griffin. È stata uccisa 15 anni fa.

translation.en: And out of respect for Lori Griffin,
translation.it: E, in segno di rispetto per Lori Griffin,

translation.en: her desk has remained completely untouched.
translation.it: nessuno ha più toccato la sua scrivania,

translation.en: Since that night.
Everything is the same, just the way she left it. Her case notes,
translation.it: È tutto come lo ha lasciato. I suoi appunti,

translation.en: her uneaten breakfast burrito,
her pet rabbit, Gulliver. God, I miss that little guy.
translation.it: il suo coniglietto, Gulliver. Dio, quanto mi manca.

translation.en: You know, you can feed those things even after the owner's gone.
translation.it: Poteva dargli da mangiare anche se il padrone non c'era più.

translation.en: It would not be respectful to touch it.
translation.it: Toccandolo, le avrei mancato di rispetto.

translation.en: Just feed and water them, a rabbit can live--
translation.it: Con acqua e cibo, un coniglio più vivere…

translation.en: Disrespectful.
40 years.
Disrespectful.
What'd you do prior to this,
before you decided to become a homicide detective? What kind of work were you in?
translation.it: Prima di decidere di diventare un detective della omicidi.

translation.en: Been a lot of things. An entertainer for a while. I, uh--
translation.it: Ho fatto molte cose. Ho lavorato un po' nello spettacolo…

translation.en: Yeah. Well, listen, none of that matters now. Nobody cares.
-Well, you just asked. -No, but none of it matters.
translation.it: - L'ha chiesto lei. - Sì, ma non ha importanza.

translation.en: City homicide isn't for precious little man-boys
translation.it: La squadra omicidi non è per i bamboccioni

translation.en: who are afraid to get their lips dirty and their pants wet. Okay?
translation.it: che hanno paura di sporcarsi le labbra e bagnarsi i pantaloni. Ok?

translation.en: No, I wouldn't think so.
'Cause you don't know anything about getting your lips dirty, do you?
translation.it: Non sai che vuol dire sporcarsi le labbra.

translation.en: You probably keep your lips real clean.
translation.it: Immagino che le tue siano molto pulite.

translation.en: I can get these lips as dirty as you want them to be.
translation.it: Posso sporcare queste labbra quanto vuole.

translation.en: Just covered in all kinds of stuff.
City homicide, we're bad dudes.
I'm a bad dude. Are you a bad dude?
translation.it: Io sono un tipo tosto. E tu?

translation.en: Listen,
you are a bad mofo. Everyone knows it.
translation.it: lei è un vero duro. Lo sanno tutti.

translation.en: And I want to get in there. I want to get my hands dirty, my lips dirty.
translation.it: Voglio esserlo anch'io. Voglio sporcarmi mani e labbra.

translation.en: I want to solve whatever case comes our way.
translation.it: Voglio risolvere qualunque caso ci capiti.

translation.en: He's got the goods.
He's got what it takes to be a hard-ass, homicide detective trainee.
translation.it: Ha quello che serve per diventare uno stagista detective con le palle.

translation.en: Well, that's good news. Because there's been a murder.
translation.it: È un'ottima notizia. Perché c'è stato un omicidio.

translation.en: What?
A magician performing at the grand opening of the city library
translation.it: Un mago che si esibiva durante l'inaugurazione della biblioteca civica

translation.en: sawed his assistant in half
translation.it: ha tagliato in due la sua assistente,

translation.en: but couldn't put her back together again.
translation.it: e non è riuscito a rimetterla insieme.

translation.en: [grunts] Classic Humpty Dumpty.
I need you two down there on the double.
Goodbye, Chief.
You ready to go solve this murder?
I am. I'm ready to go.
-Yeah, let's get going. -All right.
[Terry] We took my '82 Dodge Rampage
translation.it: Prendemmo il mio Dodge Rampage dell'82,

translation.en: over to the library to check out the crime scene.
translation.it: e raggiungemmo la scena del crimine.

translation.en: It was time for Conan to take off his training diaper
translation.it: Era ora che Conan togliesse il pannolino da stagista

translation.en: and start pooping his pants like a big boy.
translation.it: e si facesse la cacca nei pantaloni come i bimbi grandi.

translation.en: Terry Seattle, Senior Detec-- Doesn't matter.
translation.it: È arrivato Terry Seattle. Non serve.

translation.en: You don't need to show-- we're in a crime scene, okay?
translation.it: Non devi mostrare… È una scena del crimine, ok?

translation.en: I think we should find out what the hell went on here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo scoprire che diavolo è successo qui.

translation.en: -Officers. -Officers.
I already said officers.
Okay.
Well, well, look at this guy.
You must be Terry's new partner.
Yes. I'm his new partner, Conan O'Brien. What's your name?
translation.it: Sì. Mi chiamo Conan O'Brien. E lei?

translation.en: Detective Darren Phillips. Most people call me Daz.
translation.it: Detective Darren Phillips. Ma tutti mi chiamano Daz.

translation.en: Nobody call-- I don't call you Daz at all.
translation.it: Nessuno… Io non ti chiamo Daz.

translation.en: [Daz] It's a pleasure.
Detective Phillips, honor to see you. What's going on?
translation.it: Detective Phillips, è un onore. Cos’è successo?

translation.en: All right, stop schmoozing with this guy. What's wrong? You're just embarrassing.
translation.it: Smettila di leccargli il culo. Che ti prende? Sei imbarazzante.

translation.en: Just tell him it's our crime scene and get the hell out of here.
translation.it: Mandalo via, è la nostra scena del crimine.

translation.en: Hey, this is our crime scene. We're taking lead on this one.
translation.it: Ehi, è la nostra scena del crimine. Ce ne occupiamo noi.

translation.en: We understand there's been a homicide murder.
translation.it: Ci hanno detto che c'è stato un omicidio… per uccisione.

translation.en: Uh, victim sawed in half during some kind of magical performance, if you will.
translation.it: La vittima è stata segata in due durante uno spettacolo di magia.

translation.en: Why are you telling him? He's an officer.
translation.it: Perché glielo dici? È un agente.

translation.en: I'm reviewing the facts of what I've heard so far.
translation.it: Sto facendo il punto di quello che ho sentito finora.

translation.en: Let's continue. Sir, please. How can we help?
translation.it: Andiamo avanti. Come possiamo essere d'aiuto?

translation.en: What do we got here?
This gentleman is Captivating Keith.
It was his assistant who got sawed in half.
translation.it: Quella segata in due era la sua assistente.

translation.en: I don't know what happened, man.
My assistant, Sarah and me, we just--
translation.it: Io e la mia assistente, Sarah…

translation.en: we did the same routine we've always done.
translation.it: abbiamo fatto quello che facevamo sempre.

translation.en: Somebody must have gone in and they must have
replaced the trick saw with a real saw.
translation.it: e deve aver sostituito la sega finta con una vera.

translation.en: The blood. There, there, blood. It's just everywhere! Blood!
translation.it: Il sangue… Lì e lì… C'era sangue dappertutto!

translation.en: Did you think at any point when there was all that blood
translation.it: Quando ha visto tutto quel sangue, non ha pensato neanche per un momento

translation.en: that maybe you should stop sawing? Did that occur to you?
translation.it: che forse era meglio fermarsi? Non ci ha pensato?

translation.en: Maybe.
Did you have a safe word that you normally employ?
translation.it: Non avevate una parola di sicurezza?

translation.en: -Of course we had a safe word. -Okay.
If anything was to go wrong, my assistant was supposed to shout, "Stop!"
translation.it: In caso di problemi, la mia assistente doveva dire: "Basta!"

translation.en: But all I heard was, "Keith, you're sawing me in half."
translation.it: Ma lei ha detto: "Keith, mi stai segando in due".

translation.en: -I guess it's not the safe word. -No, they're not the same.
translation.it: - Non è la parola di sicurezza. - No.

translation.en: -Yeah, well… Really isn't. -There's rules.
translation.it: - Non è la stessa cosa. - Sono le regole.

translation.en: We're sorry for your loss.
translation.it: Ci dispiace per la sua perdita.

translation.en: Thank you.
This is Amber Kang. Forensics.
translation.it: Lei è Amber Kang, è della scientifica.

translation.en: Nice to see you.
Homicide detective, Kang Coroner… Uh…
-What…? -What? I'm sorry.
What are you doing? You're embarrassing, you're so nerv--
translation.it: Che stai facendo? Sei imbarazzante, sei troppo agitato…

translation.en: I got nervous.
we'd like to know what's happening here. State of the body… dead, I presume.
translation.it: vorremmo sapere cos'è successo. Stato del corpo… Morto, suppongo.

translation.en: Very dead.
What've we got here, Amber?
Let me take you over to the murder weapon.
Now, here's something interesting. No fingerprints.
translation.it: La cosa interessante è che non ci sono impronte digitali.

translation.en: But, you'll never guess what I did find on the handle.
translation.it: Ma non indovinerete mai cos'ho trovato sull'impugnatura.

translation.en: Traces of hot sauce.
-Hot sauce on the handle. -Spicy.
[chuckles] The body is right there.
And you're being a total clown.
translation.it: e lei fa il pagliaccio così?

translation.en: Now, just take it easy.
Uh… traces of hot sauce. Were you able to trace what kind of hot sauce?
translation.it: Tracce di salsa piccante. È riuscita a capire che tipo di salsa è?

translation.en: Not yet, but we also found trace amounts of pet hair.
translation.it: Non ancora, ma abbiamo trovato anche minuscole quantità di peli di un animale.

translation.en: Most likely a small animal.
Interesting.
What are you thinking? Maybe a beagle out for revenge?
Anything else, Amber?
Well, did you take a look at the suitcase?
Says this is where Captivating Keith kept his trick saw.
translation.it: È lì che l'Ammaliante Keith teneva la sega finta.

translation.en: Now apparently, he was the only one with a key
translation.it: A quanto pare, era l'unico ad avere la chiave,

translation.en: so someone must have picked the lock, switched the saws.
translation.it: quindi qualcuno deve aver forzato il lucchetto e scambiato la sega.

translation.en: [girl] Excuse me, Mr. Policeman.
Yes?
When is the magician going to finish the trick?
translation.it: Quand'è che il mago finisce il suo trucco?

translation.en: Well,
I'm gonna look at some evidence
and this tall, young gentleman here
will be happy to answer any of your questions.
translation.it: sarà felice di rispondere a tutte le tue domande.

translation.en: [Terry] So…
Hello, what's your name?
When is the magician going to put the lady back together?
translation.it: Quand'è che il mago rimette insieme la signorina?

translation.en: Well,
the lady can't go back together
translation.it: la signorina non può tornare insieme,

translation.en: because what happened,
is the magician
really sawed her in half,
cut through skin,
ligament, muscle, bone.
translation.it: i legamenti, i muscoli, le ossa…

translation.en: She had instantaneous, probably 90% blood loss
translation.it: In un attimo ha perso praticamente il 90% del suo sangue,

translation.en: and then she went into that black void
translation.it: e poi è andata in quel vuoto nero

translation.en: known as death.
Where there is no return.
translation.it: Da cui non si può tornare.

translation.en: She's gone. Gone forever.
What does that all even mean? I don't--
She's dead.
-I just don't understand-- -She's so dead.
I just don't understand. Is magic real or not?
translation.it: Non capisco. È una magia o no?

translation.en: It's a very simple question, sir. It's a yes or no!
translation.it: È una domanda semplice. Sì o no?

translation.en: It's not magic.
It is magic.
-God. -Look at the sign behind you.
Yeah, I know. That's what grown-ups call a lie.
translation.it: Lo so… È così che gli adulti chiamano le bugie.

translation.en: Is this what dying is?
That's what I told you. Yes, this is what dying is like.
translation.it: È quello che ho detto. Sì, è questa la morte.

translation.en: She'll go to heaven, right?
Oh, well, I don't know.
Will she still be in two pieces when she's in heaven?
translation.it: Sarà ancora divisa in due, in paradiso?

translation.en: Well, no, my guess is, before they put her in the ground--
translation.it: No, credo che prima di seppellirla la ricuciranno…

translation.en: All right, trainee, let's go. We found some new evidence.
translation.it: Andiamo, stagista. Abbiamo delle nuove prove.

translation.en: [grunts] Was on my knee for a long time.
translation.it: Sono stato inginocchiato per un bel po'.

translation.en: [Terry] Our first suspect was Captivating Keith's former assistant, Deb.
translation.it: Il primo sospettato era Deb, la ex assistente dell'Ammaliante Keith. Era appena stata licenziata e sostituita

translation.en: She'd recently been fired and replaced
translation.it: Era appena stata licenziata e sostituita con Sarah, molto più giovane, e ora molto più morta.

translation.en: with the much younger and now much deader, Sarah.
translation.it: con Sarah, molto più giovane, e ora molto più morta.

translation.en: Welcome to Quirky Jack's Homestyle Eatery.
translation.it: Benvenuti allo strano Fat Jack's Homestyle Eatery,

translation.en: Where we serve heaping portions of whimsy and medium-sized portions of food.
translation.it: dove serviamo enormi porzioni di capricci e porzioni medie di cibo.

translation.en: My name is Deb, I'll be your server.
Can I start you off with a bowl of our world-famous deep-fried chowder?
translation.it: Vi va di iniziare con la nostra famosissima zuppa di pesce fritta?

translation.en: We're not really hungry for food, Deb.
translation.it: Non abbiamo fame di cibo, Deb.

translation.en: We are hungry for answers.
Is this about what happened to Sarah at Keith's magic show?
translation.it: Riguarda Sarah e lo show di Keith?

translation.en: That's right. It is about what happened to Sarah.
Okay. Listen, I'll talk to you, but you're gonna have to order something
translation.it: Va bene, parlerò con voi, ma dovete ordinare qualcosa,

translation.en: because otherwise my boss is gonna get mad.
translation.it: o il mio capo si infurierà.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, well, I could eat something.
Sure, yeah. I'll have…
Oh, you know what, they got the sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.it: Hanno il panino unto con gli jalapeño.

translation.en: They're back. Yeah, we'll take two of those. The sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.it: Prendiamo due di quelli. Due panini unti con jalapeño.

translation.en: Do you want to add two sloparitas for five bucks more?
translation.it: Volete due margarita unti per cinque dollari in più?

translation.en: -[Conan] Let's do it. -Two, dos, sloparitas.
translation.it: - Perché no? - Sì, dos margarita unti.

translation.en: -Yes. -I'll be back with your food.
You're gonna love this sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.it: Amerai questo panino unto con jalapeño.

translation.en: You have never had a wetter sandwich. It's unbelievable.
translation.it: Non esiste un panino più bagnato. È incredibile.

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm looking forward to it.
It's like eating throw up. That's delicious.
translation.it: È come mangiare vomito. È squisito.

translation.en: All right, we got two sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.it: Ecco qua. Due panini unti con jalapeño.

translation.en: Yes, we sure do.
And two sloparitas.
Two sloparitas.
This is good. And you gotta try some of this signature spicy slop sauce.
translation.it: Fantastico. Devi provare un po' della loro salsa unta speciale.

translation.en: [Terry] You know, it just makes it extra sloppy.
translation.it: Dà quel tocco di unto in più.

translation.en: [Deb] That is extremely hot…
Yeah. That's good. You have never had a sloppier sandwich.
translation.it: Così va bene. Non hai mai mangiato un panino così unto.

translation.en: -Get right into it, huh? -[Terry] Yup. Eat up.
Yeah, I got other tables, so…
Well, I don't have other murders. So.
translation.it: Ma io non ho altri omicidi.

translation.en: -God, it's wet. -Okay.
Yeah, okay.
[Terry] That is a sloppy sandwich.
-[Deb] I tried to warn you. -Yeah.
translation.it: - È piccante, vero? Te l'avevo detto. - Sì.

translation.en: [Terry] All right, you got some questions in your notebook.
translation.it: Ti eri scritto delle domande sul taccuino.

translation.en: [Deb] Yeah, did you have questions for me?
translation.it: Sì, avete delle domande per me?

translation.en: Go ahead. Shoot. This is your time to shine.
-Jesus Christ. -[Terry] Hey, we haven't got all day.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio. - Non abbiamo tutto il giorno.

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry.
Wanna take another bite first? Are you hungry?
translation.it: Vuoi dare un altro morso? Hai fame?

translation.en: Let me get that sloppy for you. You've never had a sloppy sandwich.
translation.it: Lascia che te lo unga un altro po'. Non avevi mai mangiato un panino così.

translation.en: -Well, this is great. -Just slop it. Really slop it.
No, it's great. It's very aggressive on your part.
translation.it: Va bene. È un po' aggressivo da parte sua.

translation.en: [Terry] Go ahead.
[Terry] Dive in there, Conan.
Is it true Captivating Keith
replaced you with Sarah 'cause he thought you'd gotten too old?
translation.it: l'ha sostituita con Sarah perché per lui era diventata troppo vecchia?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Conan. What the hell's wrong with you?
translation.it: Cristo Santo, Conan. Cos'hai che non va?

translation.en: I spent the best years of my life
translation.it: Ho passato i migliori anni della mia vita

translation.en: getting shoved into boxes and like, attacked
translation.it: a farmi infilare in una scatola, attaccata dalle colombe.

translation.en: by doves or very mean animals.
For what? So I can be replaced
translation.it: E per cosa? Per essere sostituita

translation.en: by some 19-year-old with fake boobs
translation.it: da una diciannovenne con le tette finte

translation.en: who doesn't even know how to pick a closed-shackle padlock.
translation.it: che non sa nemmeno forzare un lucchetto chiuso.

translation.en: [Deb] It's humiliating!
Get in there! You're not--
I don't know what you're talking about! I'm eating everything!
translation.it: Ma che dice? Sto mangiando tutto!

translation.en: [Deb] He's right. You're not slopping the Joe.
translation.it: Ha ragione, quel panino è quasi asciutto.

translation.en: I wanna die.
Another question for you.
Is it safe to say you held a grudge against Sarah?
translation.it: Si può dire che lei provasse rancore per Sarah?

translation.en: Duh! Wouldn't you?
Probably.
What's wrong with your face?
I have high blood pressure.
Is there anyone else who might have wanted to hurt her?
translation.it: C'è qualcun altro che potrebbe averla voluta morta?

translation.en: She used to be another magician's assistant. Magic Melvin.
translation.it: Era l'assistente di un altro mago. Il Magico Melvin.

translation.en: Yeah. I heard they separated on bad terms, so you could talk to him.
translation.it: Sì. Ho sentito che non si sono lasciati bene, può parlare con lui.

translation.en: [Terry] You okay?
Maybe you need to get in that sloppy--
No, I can't. I honestly, I have had so much of that right now.
translation.it: Non ce la faccio. Sul serio, sono arrivato al limite.

translation.en: -Everything's gonna be okay. -[Deb] It's not gonna be okay!
translation.it: - Andrà tutto bene. - Non è vero!

translation.en: Dude, look at my life!
No one wants to hire a 40-year-old magician's assistant!
translation.it: Nessun mago vuole assumere un'assistente di 40 anni!

translation.en: Oh, please.
I work in this crappy job.
My clothes smell like steam meat. My stupid boyfriend tried to cheer me up
translation.it: I miei vestiti puzzano di carne al vapore. Il mio ragazzo ha cercato di tirarmi su

translation.en: by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies.
translation.it: comprandomi un cucciolo, ma sono allergica.

translation.en: So, I had to tell him, "You can't keep that dog in my house."
translation.it: Così, ho dovuto dirgli: "Non puoi tenere quel cane a casa mia".

translation.en: And then he said, "I can't talk right now, Deb. I'm with my wife and kids."
translation.it: E lui ha detto: "Non ora, Deb. Sono con mia moglie e i miei figli.

translation.en: "And you know we have boundaries."
So, now I have no choice but to go over to his house
translation.it: Quindi, ora non mi rimane che andare a casa sua

translation.en: and make a scene in front of his entire family.
translation.it: e fare una scenata davanti alla sua famiglia.

translation.en: I'll take this when you're ready.
[Terry] Thanks to Deb's tip,
we brought Captivating Keith's rival, Magic Melvin, in for questioning.
translation.it: convocammo Il Magico Melvin, il rivale dell'Ammaliante Keith.

translation.en: It was time for Conan and me to take the gloves off.
translation.it: Per me e Conan era ora di dare una marcia in più alle indagini.

translation.en: We got a suspect. We got this guy Melvin coming in.
translation.it: Abbiamo un sospettato. Melvin è qui.

translation.en: -We're gonna break this guy. -Okay.
We're gonna break his will.
translation.it: Facciamo a pezzi la sua volontà.

translation.en: Want to do good cop bad cop? Or should we just both be bad cop?
translation.it: Facciamo poliziotto buono e poliziotto cattivo, o tutti cattivi?

translation.en: I think two bad-- I think bad cop, bad cop.
-[Conan] Bad cop, worse cop. -[Terry] Yeah.
Here we go.
Can I get you anything? Coffee, anything you need?
translation.it: Posso portarle qualcosa? Un caffè? Qualcos'altro?

translation.en: Actually, yup, you know what, I'll have a breakfast burrito.
Uh, three eggs,
soft scrambled, onions and peppers,
Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
And you know what my favorite trick is?
translation.it: Sa qual è il mio trucco preferito?

translation.en: Making that little thing disappear every morning.
Okay, no food for a murder suspect.
translation.it: Niente colazione per i sospettati di omicidio.

translation.en: Do you guys want anything?
Get out of here, Hughes. You're the worst.
Now, you listen to me, Melvin. Grab a seat, O'Brien.
translation.it: Ora, ascoltami, Melvin. Prendi una sedia, O'Brien.

translation.en: God, that started off so cool.
I know, I couldn't--
You flipped it and then you couldn't land it.
No, I just-- I didn't think about it ahead of time.
translation.it: No… Non me l'ero studiata in anticipo.

translation.en: [Terry] So, magic Melvin.
Can you see me through the mirror?
Oh, hi. I talk to my wife like this when she's doing her makeup.
translation.it: Oh, salve. Parlo così a mia moglie, mentre si trucca.

translation.en: -You got a lot of jokes, Melvin. -Yeah, you got a lot of jokes.
translation.it: - Hai la battuta pronta, Melvin. - Prontissima.

translation.en: Well, you know, as a magician I do have patter and I do like to have fun.
translation.it: Per un mago far ridere è importante, e a me piace far ridere.

translation.en: Tell my partner a joke.
Alright, so these two Jews walk into a--
translation.it: Ok. Due ebrei entrano in un…

translation.en: -Jews, okay, no. We're not cool with that. -Okay, alright, we're not gonna do that.
translation.it: - No. Così non va. - Non va bene.

translation.en: [Terry] Do something else.
Alright. So, four or five Jews--
-No, no, no. -You know what? No.
[Terry] No, listen up, Melvin.
Do you know what happened to your former assistant, Sarah, today?
translation.it: Sai cos'è successo alla tua ex assistente Sarah?

translation.en: Yes, it's terrible. It's a magician's worst nightmare.
translation.it: Sì, è terribile. L'incubo di ogni mago.

translation.en: Unbelievable acting.
You don't seem that busted up about it and I wonder why?
translation.it: Non sembri sconvolto, e mi chiedo perché.

translation.en: 'Cause maybe you had something to do with it!
Detective, what are you accusing me of?
translation.it: Detective, di cosa mi sta accusando?

translation.en: A young woman was murdered against her will today
translation.it: Oggi una giovane donna è stata uccisa contro la sua volontà,

translation.en: and if I find out that you had anything to do with it,
translation.it: e se scopro che c'entri qualcosa,

translation.en: I swear to God, I will peel off your skin,
translation.it: giuro su Dio che ti strappo la pelle,

translation.en: eat it and then shit it out
and use that excrement
as fertilizer to grow a tree from which I will one day hang you from.
translation.it: come fertilizzante per far crescere un albero a cui un giorno ti impiccherò.

translation.en: You're gonna die and we're going to watch you,
unless you tell us exactly, exactly what happened!
translation.it: a meno che non ci dici esattamente cos'è successo.

translation.en: -What happened? -What happened?
Detectives, I am as law-abiding as they come.
translation.it: Detective, nessuno è più rispettoso della legge di me.

translation.en: I can give you an example.
Whenever I find something that's not mine, I always return it.
translation.it: Se trovo qualcosa che non è mio, lo restituisco sempre.

translation.en: Such as this quarter I just found
translation.it: Come questo quarto di dollaro che ho appena trovato

translation.en: -What the--? -behind your ear!
translation.it: - Ma che… - dietro il suo orecchio.

translation.en: And wait! Oh, oh, my goodness. Look at this, another one!
translation.it: Aspetti. Oh, mio Dio. Guardi, ce n'è un altro!

translation.en: Can you see that?
Yeah, he's got it in his hand before…
That's incredible!
Quarters are very easy to lose behind your ears
translation.it: È facile perdere i quarti di dollaro dietro le orecchie,

translation.en: -because they're small. -[Terry] 'cause they're small.
But if I mix it up just a little bit. You can hear it and I--
translation.it: Ma se li scuoto un po'… Sentite il rumore.

translation.en: blow it, look at this.
And now it's a single half-dollar fifty-cent piece. [laughs]
translation.it: Sono diventati un'unica moneta da 50 centesimi.

translation.en: Make sure to put that in your piggy bank.
-That is astounding. -It's not.
Holy shit.
He's always got one in the other hand.
My jaw is on the floor.
Oh, well, then maybe we should clean it up.
translation.it: Allora è meglio dare una pulita.

translation.en: -Actually, that was pretty cool. -Let me just clean up the jaw.
translation.it: - Questo è stato forte. - Puliamo la mandibola.

translation.en: -[Conan] I like that one. -We don't need this thing anymore.
translation.it: - Mi è piaciuto. - Non ci serve più.

translation.en: So all we do a little pixie dust. Rub it on here and--
translation.it: Quindi ci mettiamo sopra un po' di polvere magica, e…

translation.en: -[Conan] I didn't see-- Okay, that was… -[Terry] No way!
translation.it: - Non ho visto… È stato… - Incredibile!

translation.en: -That was insane. That was… -[Melvin] That's what I'm talking about.
translation.it: - Pazzesco! - È quello che volevo sentire.

translation.en: -That was a solid B+ up-close trick. -I got to be honest with you--
translation.it: - Un trucco da B+ proprio sotto il naso. - Sarò sincero,

translation.en: I feel good, I feel like I'm good with this suspect. There's nothing.
translation.it: ho una buona sensazione per questo sospettato.

translation.en: No, I have questions.
Can you tell us what happened between you and your old assistant?
translation.it: Può dirci cos'è successo tra lei e la sua ex assistente?

translation.en: Was there a falling out?
-I can tell you the whole story. -[Terry] Okay.
translation.it: - Vi dirò tutta la storia. - Ok.

translation.en: But first I just need some help from you.
translation.it: Ma prima ho bisogno del vostro aiuto.

translation.en: -Okay. -If you don't mind.
Anything ever.
So, what I'd like you to do is, here's a deck of cards.
translation.it: Ora vi spiego. Ecco un mazzo di carte.

translation.en: Don't they frisk people before they bring them into this interrogation room?
translation.it: Non li perquisite prima di portarli nella stanza degli interrogatori?

translation.en: -Now. -[Terry] Okay.
-I'll spread these out and I want you-- -Looks like a regular deck of cards.
translation.it: - Le metto così… - Sembra un mazzo normale.

translation.en: Please, detective, to take any card you want.
translation.it: Detective, scelga una carta, quella che vuole.

translation.en: Any one, any card. Don't let me influence you.
translation.it: Una qualsiasi. Non si faccia influenzare da me.

translation.en: Just choose one. Is that the one you want? Do you want to change your mind?
translation.it: Ne scelga una. Quella? Vuole cambiarla?

translation.en: -Okay. I do want to change my mind. -Very good.
I'm gonna take this one here.
We can be here all day. Thank you.
I'd love to be here-- I mean, I could watch this all day.
translation.it: Magari… Potrei guardarla tutto il giorno.

translation.en: You've taken the card. Show it to your partner, please. Do not show it to me.
translation.it: Ha preso la carta. La mostri al suo partner, ma non a me.

translation.en: I'm looking away, I'm looking down. Alright.
translation.it: Guardo da un'altra parte, guardo giù. Bene.

translation.en: And now I'd like you to put it back anywhere you like in the deck.
translation.it: Ora la rimetta nel mazzo, dove vuole lei.

translation.en: I'm going to watch this hands this whole time. I'm gonna get this.
translation.it: Gli terrò d'occhio le mani tutto il tempo. Lo scoprirò.

translation.en: Eye on him.
And now, we're going to mix them up real good. And I will tell you
translation.it: Ora le mischiamo per bene. E vi dirò

translation.en: that Sarah was my assistant for a few months
translation.it: che Sarah è stata la mia assistente per qualche mese,

translation.en: and everything was going great.
She'd been doing a terrific job and then one day,
she just didn't show up for work,
translation.it: non si è presentata al lavoro.

translation.en: and I thought it was strange. And then the next week,
translation.it: Mi sembrò strano. Una settimana dopo,

translation.en: I saw that she was working for Captivating Keith
translation.it: la vidi lavorare per l'Ammaliante Keith,

translation.en: and he was performing all my tricks!
translation.it: e lui faceva tutti i miei trucchi!

translation.en: -She stole your tricks. -She stole your act.
translation.it: - Le aveva rubato i trucchi. - E la scena.

translation.en: -That's motive, right there. -That is motive, that is.
Aha, but I will tell you it's been a blessing
translation.it: Ma, credetemi, è stata una benedizione.

translation.en: because it took me out of my comfort zone
translation.it: Mi ha spinto a uscire dalla mia comfort zone,

translation.en: and it forced me to take my act to the next level.
translation.it: e a portare il mio show al livello successivo.

translation.en: So I'm very thankful for this.
-Can I ask the two of you a question? -Yeah, ask away.
Sir, would you please lift up this tape recorder
that's been sitting here the entire time in full view
translation.it: che è stato qui tutto il tempo, in bella vista,

translation.en: and you'll see that there is in fact a single playing card.
translation.it: vedrà che sotto c'è un'unica carta da gioco.

translation.en: Would you, for the very first time,
translation.it: Può dirci, per la prima volta,

translation.en: tell us what card you picked out of the deck?
translation.it: quale carta ha pescato dal mazzo?

translation.en: It was the Queen of Spades.
Queen of Spades. And now, if you will just check
translation.it: La Regina di Picche. Ora, può controllare

translation.en: the card right there and tell us all, show us all
translation.it: quella carta e dirci, anzi, mostrarci

translation.en: that it is, in fact, the Queen of Spades.
translation.it: se è proprio la Regina di Picche?

translation.en: Are you kidding?
Ladies and gentlemen.
That is sorcery!
That's incredible!
No one gets that excited about the cards.
translation.it: Nessuno si emoziona così per delle carte.

translation.en: Are you--
Maybe if you're that scared, you should cuff me up.
translation.it: Se ha così paura, dovrebbe ammanettarmi.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah! Let me get in on this.
Let's see, okay, let's see. No way.
You know, the problem with handcuffs is that
translation.it: Il problema delle manette è che a volte

translation.en: they sometimes don't seem to work
especially on someone who knows actual magic!
translation.it: soprattutto su chi conosce la magia.

translation.en: [Terry] He did it!
Thank you very much.
Gentlemen, I would love to stick around all day and do my whole act,
translation.it: Mi piacerebbe mostrarvi tutti i miei trucchi,

translation.en: but I have to get going. I have a children's show today
translation.it: ma devo andare, oggi ho uno show per bambini.

translation.en: and I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
So if I'm free to go…
Uh, gentlemen, I bid you farewell.
Hey, sorry, it's down the hall
through the double doors and then to the right or left?
translation.it: dopo le doppie porte vado a destra o sinistra?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, through the-- and to the-- to your right, yes.
translation.it: Sì, dopo le doppie porte… a destra.

translation.en: -Right, okay. -Okay.
[Terry] We had one more suspect, and to get to her,
translation.it: Per il nostro terzo e ultimo sospettato,

translation.en: Conan was going to have to make a house call.
translation.it: Conan doveva fare una visita a domicilio.

translation.en: Alright, this is the home of Kathy Johanson.
translation.it: Ok, questa è la casa di Kathy Johanson.

translation.en: She's the leader of the local chapter of Mothers Against Magic Association.
translation.it: È a capo della sezione locate della MAMA, la Lega delle madri contro la magia

translation.en: They believe that magic can lead to the occult,
translation.it: Credono che la magia porti all'occulto,

translation.en: devil worship, and S-E-X.
translation.it: all'adorazione del diavolo, e al S-E-S-S-O.

translation.en: Sex.
You knew what I meant when I said--?
translation.it: Hai capito cosa intendevo quando con…

translation.en: -Yeah. I spelled it out. -I see.
translation.it: - Sì, ho unito le lettere. - Ok.

translation.en: So what I need you to do is, I need to get in there and infiltrate
translation.it: Voglio che tu vada lì dentro come infiltrato,

translation.en: and see if she is capable of murder.
translation.it: e cerchi di capire se è capace di uccidere.

translation.en: And you're going to use this earpiece,
where I got an earpiece in and you're going to use this ear piece.
translation.it: Io avrò un auricolare, e tu userai quest'auricolare.

translation.en: And I'm going to put that in and I--
You're gonna put it in and you're just going to listen to what I got to tell you.
translation.it: Lo infili, e ascolti quello che ti dico.

translation.en: And just do exactly as I say.
translation.it: E fai esattamente quello che ti dico.

translation.en: Okay.
But we need a code word. Obviously.
translation.it: Ci serve una parola in codice.

translation.en: If things go south.
translation.it: Se le cose si mettono male.

translation.en: If things go south, we're going to need a code word.
translation.it: Sì, ci serve una parola in codice.

translation.en: I got it.
Tittynope.
Tittynope.
Yeah, you know what "Tittynope" means?
No, I don't.
It's like a small gathering of like leftovers.
translation.it: È una quantità minuscola di qualcosa, ad esempio di avanzi.

translation.en: Like a crumbs or whatever on a plate.
translation.it: Un cincinino di briciole nel piatto.

translation.en: -Oh, a little tittynope. -Yeah, it's a little tittynope.
translation.it: - Oh, un cincinino. - Sì, un cincinino.

translation.en: This is a great ride, by the way.
Thank you.
Yeah, is it a car or a party favor?
translation.it: Ma è un'auto o una bomboniera?

translation.en: Oh, you're kidding.
I should go.
[Terry] Alright, Conan. I want you to approach the door and knock.
translation.it: Ok, Conan. Avvicinati alla porta, e bussa.

translation.en: Hello, there, lovely woman.
Well, hello there, lovely woman.
I'm sorry, but this is a private event for mothers only.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma questo è un evento privato solo per mamme.

translation.en: Yeah, but I just moved to town.
Yeah, you see, I just moved to town.
And I really hate magic.
And I hate magic.
Can I get some kind of a day pass?
And I thought maybe I could get a day pass. Is that cool?
translation.it: Potrebbe darmi un pass giornaliero. Che ne dice?

translation.en: What's your name?
It's Todd.
-It's Todd. -Todd, Todd what?
My name is Todd Caring.
-Ton. -Berg.
Caringtonberg. My name--
I'm sorry, Todd Caringtonbergson, and--
Where are you from, Todd Caringtonbergensonfield?
translation.it: E da dove viene, Todd Caringtonbergensonfield?

translation.en: Just pick a state that nobody lives in.
translation.it: Uno stato in cui non vive nessuno.

translation.en: I'm from Idaho.
I grew up in Idaho.
You're doing great, partner. Really great.
translation.it: Stai andando benissimo, partner. Davvero alla grande.

translation.en: But listen, you're on your own for a few minutes.
translation.it: Ti lascio solo per qualche minuto.

translation.en: There's something really important I need to do.
translation.it: Devo fare una cosa molto importante.

translation.en: I'm sure that you heard what happened to my son, Jimothy.
translation.it: Sono certa che ha sentito cos'è successo a mio figlio, Jimothy.

translation.en: One day he was practicing coin tricks in front of the mirror.
translation.it: Un giorno provava un trucco allo specchio,

translation.en: The next, he's God knows where,
translation.it: e quello dopo Dio solo sa dov'era

translation.en: doing street magic and playing Hide the Honker.
translation.it: a fare magie da strada e rubare i nasi della gente.

translation.en: Yes, so--
You'd think these magicians
would take responsibility for their actions, but they don't care.
translation.it: la responsabilità delle proprie azioni, ma non gli importa.

translation.en: I've been begging Captivating Keith for years to think of the children.
translation.it: Sono anni che supplico l'Ammaliante Keith di pensare ai bambini.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Begged him.
And if that poor assistant of his, if her murder
translation.it: E se la sua povera assistente… se la sua morte

translation.en: saves even one child from a life of magic,
translation.it: salverà un solo bambino dalla magia,

translation.en: it would have been worth it.
-Can I make you a snack? -Yes.
-Yes, that's fine. -Okay.
Let me get you a bowl of Helen's famous chili!
translation.it: Le do una scodella del famoso chili di Helen.

translation.en: Thank you, Helen.
Yeah, I can already believe--
Here, you're gonna want some of this on it
translation.it: Ci metta sopra un po' di questa,

translation.en: because, to be honest,
that cat food has more taste than this chili.
translation.it: il cibo per gatti ha più sapore di questo chili.

translation.en: So let me get this straight. You're angry and you're happy.
translation.it: Quindi, mi faccia capire bene. È arrabbiata, ma felice.

translation.en: I wouldn't say happy, it's a death. But
translation.it: Non direi "felice". Si parla di morte.

translation.en: if you think about the power of death and life after.
translation.it: Ma se pensiamo al potere della morte e alla vita dopo la morte…

translation.en: -How's that? -It's so good.
-Yes? -It's so good.
Oh, my goodness.
[Kathy] I've got to get this meeting started!
Okay, let's sit you down right over here. Todd.
translation.it: Ok, si sieda. Si metta lì, Todd.

translation.en: Oh. Oh, yes. Right here? Sure.
Thank you so much. Let's get started, ladies.
Why don't we gather around?
Okay, now before we get started,
I'd like to introduce a very special guest.
Todd, go ahead and stand up. Don't be shy.
translation.it: Todd, si alzi. Non sia timido.

translation.en: -[ladies applauding] -Todd, ladies, this is Todd.
New members always give a testimonial
translation.it: I nuovi membri raccontano sempre qualcosa.

translation.en: and I'd like you to stand here and tell this group of God-fearing women
translation.it: Vorrei che parlasse a questo gruppo di donne timorate di Dio

translation.en: the moment that you realized magic
translation.it: del momento in cui hai capito che la magia

translation.en: is the devil's tool.
Well, I'll tell you all it was an incredible experience that I had.
translation.it: Beh, ho vissuto un'esperienza davvero incredibile.

translation.en: -[sad music] -I was a child
and I wanted to be a magician.
So I practiced and practiced
and became quite the magician, a very good magician.
translation.it: e alla fine divenni un mago piuttosto bravo.

translation.en: And one day I went down to the school yard, and I said,
translation.it: Un giorno andai nel cortile della scuola, e dissi:

translation.en: "Check this out" and I fanned out my deck,
translation.it: "Guardate qui," poi aprii a ventaglio il mio mazzo,

translation.en: and before I could do anything else,
translation.it: e prima che potessi fare altro,

translation.en: they beat me.
They beat me for 40 minutes,
then they stopped,
and they went and got ice cream,
came back and continued beating me.
And what happened to the boys who beat you up?
translation.it: Cos'è successo ai ragazzi che l'hanno picchiata?

translation.en: Well, they all became senators. Every single one of them.
Name one.
Was the head bully.
Beat me savagely.
It doesn't make any sense.
I'm starting to wonder if your name is even Todd Caringtonbergenson.
translation.it: Comincio a chiedermi se Todd Caringtonbergenson è davvero il suo nome.

translation.en: Oh, please.
Todd, what is the state fish of Idaho?
translation.it: Todd, qual è il pesce nazionale dell'Idaho?

translation.en: It is a…
white-bellied cod.
[Kathy] Wrong!
It's the cutthroat trout.
translation.it: È la trota dalla gola rossa.

translation.en: Well, who knows the state fish?
This person is an imposter, ladies,
and he's using the art of illusion
to get us to have S-E-X.
Get him! Mama! Mama!
-Mama! Mama! Mama! -Tittynope! Tittynope!
[male voice] …just appeared then.
Now, we have to do French drop which is a ball transfer,
translation.it: Ora dobbiamo fare uno scambio alla francese, così,

translation.en: reach forward again, and again you say,
translation.it: portare la mano in avanti, e dire:

translation.en: "Oh, is that another quarter in your ear?"
translation.it: "Hai un altro quarto di dollaro dietro l'orecchio!"

translation.en: [women] Mama! Mama! Mama!
-[Conan] Tittynope. Tittynope. -Conan, what's going on? What's going on?
-Tittynope! Tittynope! -Mama! Mama!
Alright, lock yourself in a safe room, Conan.
translation.it: Ok, chiuditi in una stanza sicura, Conan.

translation.en: I'm coming to save you.
-Tittynope! -Mama! Mama! Mama!
It's locked. We can wait him out, though.
translation.it: È chiusa a chiave. Ma possiamo aspettarlo fuori.

translation.en: Ladies! There's a guy in the corner asking kids to pick a card.
translation.it: Signore! Fuori c'è un uomo che chiede ai bambini di scegliere una carta.

translation.en: Any card!
Conan! It's senior detective, Terry Seattle. You can come out now.
translation.it: Conan! Sono il detective capo Terry Seattle. Puoi uscire, ora.

translation.en: You're safe.
-You're safe. Are you okay? -I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm good.
translation.it: - Sei al sicuro. Stai bene? - Sto bene.

translation.en: All right, let's get the hell out of--
Wow. Look at all these snacks.
Let's grab some stuff, come on.
They got plain tortillas. I can never find plain tortillas.
translation.it: Ci sono le tortilla vuote. Non riesco mai a trovarle.

translation.en: Well, they're pretty available.
No, but every time I go to the grocery store, I'm like,
"Do you have any plain tortillas?" they're like, "No, we're fresh out."
They're very available.
Everyone has plain tortillas.
translation.it: Le tortilla vuote si trovano ovunque.

translation.en: [Terry] It was time for Conan to decide
translation.it: Per Conan, era il momento di decidere

translation.en: who killed poor Sarah,
translation.it: chi aveva ucciso la povera Sarah,

translation.en: so we lured the three suspects back to the library
translation.it: quindi attirammo i tre sospettati in biblioteca

translation.en: under the guise of another magic show.
translation.it: con la scusa di un altro show di magia. L'ACCUSA BIBLIOTECA CIVICA

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we will not be performing any illusions tonight.
translation.it: Signore e signori, questa sera non metteremo in scena alcuna illusione.

translation.en: No, in fact, if anything, we will be removing an illusion.
translation.it: Al contrario, al massimo rimuoveremo un'illusione.

translation.en: The illusion
of innocence.
[Terry] That's right.
Before us here are these three top hats.
translation.it: Davanti a noi ci sono tre cilindri.

translation.en: In each one is the name of a suspect.
translation.it: In ognuno, c'è il nome di un sospettato.

translation.en: My partner, Conan O'Brien,
will now reveal who he believes committed this murder.
translation.it: ci dirà chi pensa abbia commesso l'omicidio.

translation.en: Conan, was it Deb,
was it Magic Melvin,
or was it Kathy?
please choose who you think is the killer.
translation.it: scegli quello che credi sia il killer.

translation.en: The murderer…!
Magic Melvin.
[Rhonda] What is going on here?
Chief, we figured out who the killer is.
translation.it: Capo, abbiamo capito chi è il killer.

translation.en: Conan figured it out.
I have all the logic as to why it has to be Magic Melvin.
translation.it: Tutto porta a pensare che sia stato Il Magico Melvin.

translation.en: I'm not sure exactly why I dressed as a magician,
translation.it: Non so bene perché sono vestito da mago,

translation.en: but I am certain
he is the murderer.
And what is your evidence?
Magic Melvin,
you told us that you had to go Scotchgard your rabbit.
translation.it: ci ha detto di dover impermeabilizzare il suo coniglio.

translation.en: Maybe to keep hot sauce off the rabbit,
translation.it: Voleva forse salvare il coniglio dalla salsa piccante?

translation.en: because who leaves hot sauce on a saw and no fingerprints?
translation.it: Sporcare una sega di salsa piccante senza lasciare impronte,

translation.en: Why, sir, that is the act
of a magician.
I also think you had another motive.
I think that Kathy is your mother.
translation.it: Penso che Kathy sia sua madre.

translation.en: That you hate your mother
and that because she's turned her back on magic,
translation.it: e dato che ha voltato le spalle alla magia,

translation.en: you wanted to frame her.
That part's pretty far-fetched.
I'm the youngest person in this room.
translation.it: Sono la più giovane, qui dentro.

translation.en: I understand.
And I don't know how the whole age thing works.
translation.it: Non so bene come funzioni con l'età.

translation.en: I'm still working on that.
It's very possible I could be your father.
translation.it: È più probabile che io sia tuo padre.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Age-wise.
Conan O'Brien,
it brings me no joy to tell you that you are…
translation.it: Non mi dà alcuna gioia dirti che la tua deduzione è…

translation.en: Correct.
Yes!
Yes!
[Rhonda] It was Magic Melvin who killed the magician's assistant.
translation.it: È stato Il Magico Melvin a uccidere l'assistente dal mago.

translation.en: You did notice that Melvin put hot sauce on his breakfast burrito every morning.
translation.it: Hai notato che Melvin mette sempre la salsa piccante nel suo burrito.

translation.en: Three eggs soft scrambled, onions, peppers, Tabasco--
And owned a rabbit for his act.
translation.it: E che aveva un coniglio per il suo show.

translation.en: I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
We know it couldn't have been Deb. She was allergic to pets.
translation.it: Sappiamo che non può essere stata Deb. È allergica agli animali.

translation.en: My boyfriend tried to cheer me up by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies!
translation.it: Il mio ragazzo ha cercato di tirarmi su comprandomi un cucciolo ma sono allergica.

translation.en: Meanwhile Kathy had more motive than anyone,
translation.it: Kathy aveva il movente più forte,

translation.en: but she didn't know how to pick the lock on the door
translation.it: ma non ha saputo forzare la serratura

translation.en: when you ran like an overgrown gazelle for safety.
translation.it: quando sei scappato come una gazzella troppo cresciuta in cerca di rifugio.

translation.en: It's locked.
But you know who could pick a lock? Magic Melvin.
translation.it: Invece chi era capace di forzare una serratura? Il Magico Melvin.

translation.en: Especially on someone who knows actual--
-He did it! -[Melvin] Thank you very much.
Magic Melvin was the killer.
Take him away.
I only murdered her 'cause I wanted her dead!
translation.it: L'ho uccisa solo perché la volevo morta!

translation.en: It's a very-- It's a good reason to murder somebody.
translation.it: È davvero… un ottimo motivo per uccidere qualcuno.

translation.en: The handcuffs are not going to work on him.
translation.it: Le manette non funzionano con lui.

translation.en: Already, no handcuffs.
[Rhonda] Conan O'Brien, congratulations.
Well, Conan, you did it.
You solved the case, even though your logic was…
translation.it: Hai risolto il caso, anche se il tuo ragionamento…

translation.en: crazy nonsensical.
But you make a fantastic cop.
translation.it: Ma sei stato un poliziotto fantastico.

translation.en: You know, I also learned something.
I learned a little magic trick.
translation.it: Ho imparato un trucchetto di magia.

translation.en: You learned magic.
That's right. Go ahead and sneeze.
Here.
Let me get you a handkerchief.
Go ahead.
I've got a handkerchief.
It's not ending. It's not ending.
This is legitimately not ending.
-It's a lot of-- -I'm getting--
Okay, you know what? Now, I just hate magic. This is stupid.
translation.it: Ok, sai una cosa? Odio la magia. È stupida.

translation.en: [Terry] On the next episode of Murderville…
[Rhonda] Terry say hi to your new partner, Marshawn Lynch.
translation.it: Terry, saluta il tuo nuovo partner, Marshawn Lynch.

translation.en: -How much training have you had? -I watched Training Day.
translation.it: - Hai esperienza? - Ho visto Training Day.

translation.en: This was the murder weapon.
